title: Closer To Hell  A Conversation With Jack Kenna
description:
Jack Kenna is a Paranormal Investigator, as well as an Author, Public Figure, and Adjunct Teacher of his college courses on Paranormal Research. Since 2009, he is also an active paranormal investigator. Jack published several books including Hauntings, Ghosts & Demons, then in June 2018 his second book Paranormal Research. He’s been involved in countless cases, with the goal of helping and healing those paranormally effected. Today we hear his story, on The Grave Talks.

PART 3 - AVAILABLE TO GRAVE KEEPERS ONLY - LISTEN HERE In part two of our interview, available only to Grave Keepers, we discuss:

Can a person attach themselves to an object and “haunt it”, while they are alive? 

Jack teaches a course at his local college about the paranormal, what does he teach?

What are some of the most important lessons Jack wants to communicate to his students?
